content: this seamless beanie is a cozy hat for any new baby it is worked in the round either on circular needles or dpns fits head circumference of 14-15 a newborn to five month old depending on the baby this is a fantastic project for knitters who are just learning to knit in the round materials needed 85 yards of dk yarn - soft with a nice drape that will knit up to gauge size six dpns or circular needle 12 or 16 stitch markers yarn needle
